sentences.en: Enough , headman, put that aside. Don't ask me that.
sentences.cn: 聚落主! 且止!将此且置,勿以此问余.

sentences.en: He is the headman of school basket ball team.
sentences.cn: 他是学校篮球队的队长.

sentences.en: The headman of the gypsies, cowed and nervous, was apparently trying to offer explanations.
sentences.cn: 领头的吉普赛人显然被吓坏了, 正在紧张地试图解释.

trans.tran_en: the most important man in a village where a tribe lives
